sentences.sContent: The barn was heaped with grain.
The dilapidated barn detracts charm from the landscape.
sentences.sContent_eng: The dilapidated barn detracts charm from the landscape.
sentences.sCn: 圮废失修的谷仓有损景色的美。

sentences.sContent: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.sContent_eng: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.sCn: 仓库里潮气太大， 粮食就容易发霉。

synos.tran: 谷仓；畜棚；车库；靶（核反应截面单位）

remMethod.val: 酒吧(bar)加一个门(n)就成了谷仓(barn)

trans.tranOther: a large farm building for storing crops, or for keeping animals in
